snippet: Pieces by Helmut Lachenmann, Wolfgang Rihm and John Cage were on the program for the Mivos Quartet on Saturday.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by the Mivos Quartet at DiMenna Center for Classical Music in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Pieces by Helmut Lachenmann, Wolfgang Rihm and John Cage were on the program for the Mivos Quartet on Saturday.

headline.seo: Mivos Quartet Performs Compositions by Modernists
headline.main: Architects of Sound, Creating Structures From the Ground Up
headline.print_headline: Architects of Sound, Creating Structures From the Ground Up
